title: Logic Studio 8.0.2 (upgrade) serial - works via Software Update!
description:
Ok people, my first upload! Previous users have reported difficulties upgrading through Apple\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s site. Just run Apple\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s Software Update and select the 8.0.2 Logic Pro upgrade.

Attention hackintosh/osx86 (iAtkos, Kalyway, Leo4All, MacDotNub, etc.) users: Be sure to repair disk permissions after running the installation package.

To avoid coming across as a complete retard, I\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;m posting the serial as well:

E-348-DJZ-169-MYT-350-WHT-435-RLY-FB5-WXCX

I got this from another site...
